collection.name: Magical girl
The witch of Desserts
collection.openText: I just want to eat cheese again~

specialTipSize.specialTip: If instinct work is performed on an abnormality whose containment unit has been melted down, $0's Qliphoth counter will be immediately reduced.
When instinct work is performed on $0 and the result is good, $0's Qliphoth counter is immediately increased.
When the employee's fortitude is lower than level 3, the $0 body will bite off his head and escape after the work is completed.

After $0 escapes, he will stay in a random corridor motionless and will not cause harm to employees. If its health reaches zero, $0's body will appear. The body will speed up from time to time and open its mouth to attack employees on the way forward. If an employee's health is below 20% when attacked, their head will be bitten off and executed.
After $0 escapes, a witch barrier will be generated in the entire facility, reducing the red resistance of all employees.
